excerpt.rendered:
This was the 4th attempt on creating these type of landscapes, it took 3 days from start to finish.

Starting with real world terrain, eroding and modeling it, coloring and adjusting. All the way back to a complete custom approach with MultiFractal nodes setups and custom erosion setups to create long hangings, deep cliffs and rough terrain on the flats.

Unfortunately no download, but if you take a look on my page, you will find many more landscapes of your interest
